CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Optioned LHP Jesus Pena to Birmingham of the Southern League. Purchased the contract of LHP Mark Buerhle from Birmingham. American League YANKEES--Recalled INF Clay Bellinger from Columbus of the International League. Optioned OF Luke Wilcox to Columbus. ANAHEIM ANGELS--Recalled RHP Brian Cooper from Edmonton of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned RHP Lou Pote to Edmonton. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Optioned LHP Jesus Pena to Birmingham of the Southern League. Purchased the contract of LHP Mark Buerhle from Birmingham. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed 1B Tony Clark on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B Eric Munson from Jacksonville of the Southern League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Recalled LHP Tim Byrdak from Omaha. Optioned RHP Jeff D'Amico to Omaha. MINNESOTA TWINS--Signed RHP Jonathan McDonald.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Optioned 1B-OF Travis Lee to Tucson of the Pacific Coast League. ATLANTA BRAVES--Placed 2B Quilvio Veras on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Steve Sisco from Richmond of the International League. COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed LHP Scott Karl and C Scott Servais on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Bobby Chouinard and C Ben Petrick from Colorado Springs of the Pacific Coast League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Purchased the contract of INF Joe Vitiello from Las Vegas of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned OF Dusty Allen to Las Vegas.

FOOTBALL National Football League JETS--Signed DE Anthony Cook. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed RB Travis Prentice. DETROIT LIONS--Signed G Stockar McDougle to a five-year contract, WR Alonzo Johnson, LB Barrett Green, RB Reuben Droughns, CB Todd Franz, DE Quinton Reese and DT Alfonso Boone. Announced the retirement of WR Tim Alexander and C Casey Jensen. Released PK Pete Garces. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed DE Bobby Hamilton and DE Brandon Mitchell. Waived WR-KR Tony Gaiter. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed LB Darrin Smith to a one-year contract Released S Amp Campbell. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Agreed to terms with WR Todd Pinkston on a five-year contract. Announced DE Michael Mason failed his physical. Placed WR Rondel Menendez on the reserve-did not report list.

HOCKEY National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with C Jonas Ronnqvist on a two-year contract. ATLANTA THRASHERS--Signed F Dmitri Vlasenkov. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed LW Marian Gaborik to a three-year contract and RW Maxim Sushinsky to a multiyear contract. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Agreed to terms with D Andrei Markov. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Signed D Mike Commodore. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed D Ossi Vaananen to a multiyear contract.

BENEDICT--Named Cedric Baker women's basketball coach. FRANCIS MARION--Named Todd Gober women's volleyball coach. JACKSONVILLE--Named Kelvin Martin wide receivers coach and recruiting coordinator. Promoted Shap Boyd to defensive coordinator and Rick Humphreys to linebackers and special teams coach. NEW MEXICO STATE--Approved a two-year contract extension for Lou Henson, men's basketball coach, through the 2003-04 season. NYU--Named Ed Caesar men's assistant volleyball coach.
